content:
Web-public channel created by Riccardo Brasca. Description:

Information and discussion about the Lean Together 2025 meeting

Dear all,
this channel will be used to discuss the talks and everything else related to the conference.

Note that the (preliminary) schedule is now online.

If you are a speaker, please double check that the time slot is OK for you.
The Zoom link is available on the website (just click the title of a talk), but it is also here: https://imperial-ac-uk.zoom.us/j/93586929733?pwd=cu0W39ZbDes6NlbyaAbTCrzObz5bGN.1
Perhaps it's worth mentioning in #announce or somewhere that the event kicks off in a half hour in case someone's forgotten (inconceivable, this is the event of the year!)?
